#summary Baidu C/C++ Hooking Framework Demos.

Demos as follow:
  * *System* shows hooking system function
    * *disk*
      * [http://code.google.com/p/baiduhook/source/browse/trunk/test/disk/write/writefile.cpp Write] trigger disk error by using default hooking library
        # {{{bhook ./writefile}}}
        # {{{pgrep writefile}}}
        # {{{bhook -e write -p 100 -i 28 <pid>}}}
      * trigger disk error by using user hooking library.(Source:[http://code.google.com/p/baiduhook/source/browse/trunk/test/disk/user_write/user_write.cpp user_write.cpp], Hook:[http://code.google.com/p/baiduhook/source/browse/trunk/test/disk/user_write/hook.cpp hook.cpp])
        # {{{bhook -u hook.so ./user_write}}}
    * *memory*
      * [http://code.google.com/p/baiduhook/source/browse/trunk/test/memory/api/malloc.cpp Malloc] hooks system function *malloc* by using API
    * *net* similar to disk demos
      * Network is unreachable:  {{{bhook -e connect -p 100 -i 101 <pid>}}}
      * Connection reset by peer:  {{{bhook -e recv -p 100 -i 104 <pid>}}}
    * *other* 
      * hooks system function *printf* through shared library.(Source:[http://code.google.com/p/baiduhook/source/browse/trunk/test/system/user_printf/main.cpp main.cpp], Hook:[http://code.google.com/p/baiduhook/source/browse/trunk/test/system/user_printf/my_printf.cpp my_printf.cpp])
        # {{{bhook -u my_printf.so ./main}}}
  * *Program* shows a variety of hooking functions for the program
    * [http://code.google.com/p/baiduhook/source/browse/trunk/test/program/simple/hook.cpp Simple] hooks simple function through shared library
    * [http://code.google.com/p/baiduhook/source/browse/trunk/test/program/library/attachlib.cpp Library] hooks static library function by using API. 
    * [http://code.google.com/p/baiduhook/source/browse/trunk/test/program/api/api.cpp API] hooks system function *fread* and program function *func* 
  * *Unittest* shows using API with google test.
    * [http://code.google.com/p/baiduhook/source/browse/trunk/test/unittest/simple/test_attach.cpp Simple] hooks simple function.
    * [http://code.google.com/p/baiduhook/source/browse/trunk/test/unittest/class/test_class.cpp Class] hooks class public/private function.
    * [http://code.google.com/p/baiduhook/source/browse/trunk/test/unittest/sharedlibrary/test_so.cpp SharedLibrary] hooks shared-library function.
